# [Interview #1040: Steelheart Signing Report - Mysty, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1040#3)

#### Question

Will Shallan and Hoid meet and have a battle of wits?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Good question! I think you should read
*Words of Radiance*
and find out.
